description: Overview* This MHL to HDMI adapter is designed for the Galaxy S3, Galaxy S4 and Galaxy Note 2 that have 11 pin Micro USB ports.* It allows you to view videos, games, photos and other media from your Samsung smart phones directly onto an HDTV at 1080p resolution and 7.1 channel surround sound.Instructions1) Hook up your Galaxy S3/S4 or Galaxy Note 2 to your TV using this MHL to HDMI cable2) Plug in a USB charging cable to the Micro USB female socket on this MHL to HDMI cable to provide power to the chipsetSpecification* Supports Galaxy S3, Galaxy S4, and Galaxy Note2* Supports up to 1080p resolution at all bandwidth between 25-75MHz* Supports 7.1 channel surround sound, 192KHz audio transmission* Premium shielded jacket reduces electromagnetic interferenceImportant Note* Built-in USB port only supplies power for the adapter. It does not charge your smartphone device.* This MHL cable features a USB Micro-B (female) power input. Connect the conventional Micro USB charging cable to the female port when using this cable
title: Cable Matters MHL to HDMI Cable for Samsung Galaxy S3/S4 and Note 2 in Black
